title: Hanes Men's EcoSmart Fleece Full-Zip Hoodie Sweatshirt
description: FLEECE TO FEEL GOOD ABOUT - This Hanes EcoSmart zip-up hoodie is made with cotton sourced from American farms.
CLASSIC ZIP-FRONT SILHOUETTE - Hooded sweatshirt with full-zip front featuring a drawstring hood and front pockets.
UNISEX SIZING - This zip-up hoodie is designed with a standard men’s fit that also creates an effortless, oversized look for women. Female model is 5'8" and wearing a size medium.
MADE TO STAY SOFT - Made with thick, sturdy fleece for extra warmth.
DESIGN DETAILS - Double-needle stitching at the neck and armhole seams for quality and sturdiness, plus a dyed-to-match drawstring at the hood. Ribbed cuffs and hem.
BIG & TALL OPTIONS - This men's sweatshirt is available in Big Men's sizing so you can always find your perfect fit.

Hanes® EcoSmart® fleece is your new go-to wardrobe staple. Soft and plush, this cozy zip-up fleece hoodie is made of a midweight cotton/poly fleece blend that features cotton sourced from American farms. The fleece in this classic zip-front hooded jacket is incredibly soft, thick, and made to keep its warm, cozy feel. And it will hold its shape, thanks to ribbed cuffs and hem. Double-needle stitching at the neck and armhole seams further enhances quality and sturdiness. In classic hoodie style, there's a split kangaroo pocket and a dyed-to-match drawstring at the hood.
